name: Carnival Plc
membership: Various Shipowners Association within Europe (e.g. CLIA, Confitarma, KNVR, UK Shipowners Association)
goal: Carnival Corporation & plc, the world’s largest leisure travel company, provides travelers around the globe with extraordinary vacations at an exceptional value. The company’s portfolio of global cruise line brands includes Carnival Cruise Line, Fathom, Holland America Line, Princess Cruises and Seabourn in North America; P&O Cruises (UK) and Cunard in Southampton, England; AIDA Cruises in Rostock, Germany; Costa Cruises in Genoa, Italy; and P&O Cruises (Australia) in Sydney. Additionally, Carnival Corporation owns a tour company that complements its cruise operations: Holland America Princess Alaska Tours which operates in Alaska and the Yukon.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Monitoring all regulatory aspects related to Marine.  In particular those related to safety, security and environmental aspects and ports.
